sources.title: Young Widow
sources.description: Title: Young Widow Summary: A grieving war widow meets a young Lieutenant but spurns him for trying too hard to gain her affection. Will she give him a second chance when they meet again? Directed by: Edwin L. Marin Actors: Production Company: Hunt Stromberg Productions Release Date: 1 March 1946 (USA) Aspect Ratio: 1.37 : 1 A grieving war widow meets a young Lieutenant but spurns him for trying too hard to gain her affection. Will she give him a second chance when they meet again?
